Reservations

We cordially invite you to savor an extraordinary dining experience at our luxury restaurant. To ensure we provide you with impeccable service and attention to detail, we highly recommend making a reservation. Let us guide you through the seamless reservation process and secure a table for you and your guests.

Phone Reservation

If you prefer a more personal touch, our dedicated reservation team is eager to assist you. Simply call us, and one of our courteous staff members will gladly help you secure the perfect table for your upcoming dining experience.

+91 88490 94711

Whether it's an intimate dinner for two or a grand celebration, we are here to cater to your needs.

Dress Code Etiquette

At our esteemed luxury restaurant, we aim to maintain a refined and sophisticated ambiance that complements the exquisite dining experience we offer. To maintain our standard, check out some of our dress code recommendations below.

Elegant Attire Appreciated
Smart Casual is the Standard
Avoid Casual and Athletic Wear

12 Rue de la Fontaine, Vannes, 56000, France

  • Monday - Thursday: 9am – 10pm
  • Friday - Saturday: 10am – 11pm
  • Monday: 11am - 9pm

+91 88490-94711
